indicatorDots.description: Whether to display panel indicator points

indicatorColor.description: Indicates the color of the dot

indicatorActiveColor.description: The color of the currently selected indicator point
indicatorActiveColor.description_zh: 当前选中的指示点颜色

autoplay.description: Whether or not to switch automatically

current.description: The index of the slider you are currently on

currentItemId.description: The item-id of the current slider cannot be specified at the same time as current
currentItemId.description_zh: 当前所在滑块的 item-id ，不能与 current 被同时指定

duration.description: The duration of the slide animation

circular.description: Whether or not to use articulation slides

vertical.description: Whether the sliding direction is longitudinal

previousMargin.description: The leading margin, which can be used to expose a small portion of the previous item, accepts both px and rpx values
previousMargin.description_zh: 前边距，可用于露出前一项的一小部分，接受 px 和 rpx 值

nextMargin.description: The back margin, which can be used to expose a small portion of the latter item, accepts px and rpx values
nextMargin.description_zh: 后边距，可用于露出后一项的一小部分，接受 px 和 rpx 值

snapToEdge.description: When the number of swiper-items is greater than or equal to 2, turn off circular and enable previous-margin or next-margin, you can specify whether this margin is applied to the first and last element
snapToEdge.description_zh: 当 swiper-item 的个数大于等于 2，关闭 circular 并且开启 previous-margin 或 next-margin 的时候，可以指定这个边距是否应用到第一个、最后一个元素

displayMultipleItems.description: The number of sliders displayed at the same time

skipHiddenItemLayout.description: Whether to skip undisplayed slider layouts, set to true optimizes sliding performance in complex situations, but loses the layout information of the hidden state sliders
skipHiddenItemLayout.description_zh: 是否跳过未显示的滑块布局，设为 true 可优化复杂情况下的滑动性能，但会丢失隐藏状态滑块的布局信息

easingFunction.description: Specifies the type of swiper toggle easing animation
easingFunction.description_zh: 指定 swiper 切换缓动动画类型

disableTouch.description: Whether or not to prohibit the user's touch operation
disableTouch.description_zh: 是否禁止用户 touch 操作

zoom.description: Whether or not to enable scaling

full.description: Whether to turn on full screen

changingClass.description: When acceleration is set to {{true}} and is in the process of sliding, the middle screens are in the class when they are visible.
changingClass.description_zh: acceleration 设置为 {{true}} 时且处于滑动过程中，中间若干屏处于可见时的 class。

acceleration.description: When turned on, it will slide multiple screens continuously according to the sliding speed.
acceleration.description_zh: 当开启时，会根据滑动速度，连续滑动多屏。

disableProgrammaticAnimation.description: Whether to disable code changes to trigger animations when swiper switches.
disableProgrammaticAnimation.description_zh: 是否禁用代码变动触发 swiper 切换时使用动画。

swipeRatio.description: Swiper-item threshold when the sliding distance exceeds the threshold.
swipeRatio.description_zh: 滑动距离阈值，当滑动距离超过阈值时进行 swiper-item 切换。

swipeSpeed.description: Slide the comprehensive speed threshold, and when the threshold is exceeded, the swiper-item switch is performed, and the smaller the value, the more sensitive.
swipeSpeed.description_zh: 滑动综合速度阈值，当超过阈值时进行 swiper-item 切换，数值越小越敏感。

touchAngle.description: The angle at which the user's gesture is calculated. The angle is calculated based on the coordinates of the touchstart event and the first touchmove event. The smaller the value, the higher the requirements for the user's sliding direction accuracy.
touchAngle.description_zh: 计算用户手势时所依赖的滑动角度。角度根据 touchstart 事件和首次 touchmove 事件的坐标计算得出。数值越小越对用户的滑动方向准确度要求越高。

adjustHeight.description: Automatically specifies the height of the slider as the height of the entire container. When vertical is true, it is not adjusted by default. The available values are:
adjustHeight.description_zh: 自动以指定滑块的高度为整个容器的高度。当 vertical 为 true 时，默认不调整。可选值为：

adjustVerticalHeight.description: vertical 为 true 时强制使 adjust-height 生效。
adjustVerticalHeight.description_zh: vertical 为 true 时强制使 adjust-height 生效。

disableTouchmove.description: Whether to stop responding to user touchmove actions
disableTouchmove.description_zh: 是否停止响应用户 touchmove 操作

scrollWithAnimation.description: Use animation transitions when changing current
scrollWithAnimation.description_zh: 改变 current 时使用动画过渡

cacheExtent.description: The size of the cache area, a value of 1 indicates that the upper and lower screen areas (swiper container size) are rendered in advance
cacheExtent.description_zh: 缓存区域大小，值为 1 表示提前渲染上下各一屏区域（swiper 容器大小）

onChange.description: current 改变时会触发 change 事件
onChange.description_zh: current 改变时会触发 change 事件

onTransition.description: The transition event is triggered when the position of the swiper-item changes
onTransition.description_zh: swiper-item 的位置发生改变时会触发 transition 事件

onAnimationFinish.description: The animationfinish event is triggered at the end of the animation
onAnimationFinish.description_zh: 动画结束时会触发 animationfinish 事件

onAnimationEnd.description: The animationEnd event is triggered at the end of the animation
onAnimationEnd.description_zh: 动画结束时会触发 animationEnd 事件
